list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, sturdy piece of squared timber or metal spanning an opening or part of a building, usually to support the roof or floor above.
a ray or shaft of light.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a beam of light flashed in front of her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một chùm ánh sáng lóe lên trước mặt cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a radiant or good-natured look or smile.
transmit (a radio signal or broadcast) in a specified direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: beaming a distress signal into space
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: rạng rỡ một tín hiệu đau khổ vào không gian

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a light or light source) shine brightly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những tia nắng mặt trời chiếu xuống
Cô ấy cười rạng rỡ với niềm vui

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: construct a ceiling with exposed beams.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: vaulted beamed ceilings in the family room
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: trần nhà rạng rỡ trong phòng gia đình
